channel.title: VPS Hosting
channel.description: How do i put my rsps on a vps? and which vps i have to download

item.title: VPS Hosting
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

VPS Stands for “Virtual private server”, it is in a sense a computer much like you’re running that you can run your runescape private server on.

To run your runescape private server on a VPS you first need to rent a VPS from a company that provides them for real money, I would suggest reading up on how VPS work first, then you have to copy your runescape private servers over to your newly created VPS (again, it is merely a computer in a data centre somewhere) and then run your runescape private server from inside the VPS. Any questions?

Some minor distinctions: a VPS isn’t technically another computer you can run your runescape private server on, it’s a virtual computer hosted on a real server that can host dozens and hundreds of virtual private servers. The only difference between hosting a runescape private server from your home connection and a VPS is that the VPS is hosted in a data centre, is (almost) never turned off, and you don’t have to use your home internet connection to host it.

Read full topic
